attributes.additional_details:
A petition to prevent the Plymouth Royal Eye Infirmary from being severely altered and tarnished by an unjustified and profit-led redevelopment.

The artist's impressions of the proposed work look to completely overshadow and ruin the areas eye line and the building itself.

The community, overwhelmingly, believes the plans are unjustified considering local resources.

We believe our planning department is not representing us on this matter.

Please help us put a stop to the desecration of a beautiful local monument.
